scripts.make:public: mkdir -p docs/.vuepress/public/md && cp -r docs/framework docs/.vuepress/public/md/framework && cp -r docs/relations docs/.vuepress/public/md/relations && cp -r docs/server docs/.vuepress/public/md/server
scripts.build: yarn generate:all && yarn make:public && vuepress build docs
scripts.deploy: yarn build && touch docs/.vuepress/dist/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d docs/.vuepress/dist
